title: The Wicked and Forgotten
description: Robert Manis ventures off into one of the fallen cities, Nu-Philly. Under the direct orders of the Dir of the New FBI, he is to quell recent hostilities and engage the sole distributors of Nomescula on the eastern seaboard. The distributors are known as the Wicked and they will stop at nothing to maintain their hold on the market. The Wicked is in league with two other parties that want Manis dead. Each have their reasons, and each has secured a way to subdue him in Nu-Philly. Manis is heading into a trap, in more ways than one. This venture will renew old alliances, reconcile family discord, and reveal a plot hatched twenty years prior. All Manis has to do is survive the next 72hours to see it all through.
author: James Lee Nathan III
